An halfe-penny-worth of vvit, in a penny-worth of paper. Or, The hermites tale King, Humphrey.
The third impression.
35, [1] p.
Printed for Thomas Thorp, by the assignement of Edw: Blount, London : 1613.
Dedication signed: Humphrey King. In verse. Running title reads: The hermites tale. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
